prompts: Create a dragon-type Pokemon that resembles a fluffy cloud, with soft blue accents and a serene expression.
Imagine a flying-type Pokemon that uses its cloud-like wings to glide gracefully through the sky.
Show me a whimsical Pokemon that has a gentle personality, with a body resembling a delicate flower and soft colors.
Design a beautiful Fairy-type Pokemon that looks like it came straight out of a dreamy fantasy world.
Generate a Pokemon that embodies tranquility and has an ethereal presence, perfect for calming its trainers.
Make a Pokemon that blends seamlessly into the clouds, showcasing a combination of white and light blue hues.
Give me a visual of a Pokemon that delights in sunny days, soaring through the skies with fluffy white clouds.
